title: Introduction to bo
goal: Learn to use `bo` to bind the right two words in a tanru.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Default grouping review:

barda blanu gerku = ?
sutra bajra prenu = ?

(Answers: (barda blanu) gerku, (sutra bajra) prenu)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
bolci x1 is a ball/sphere of material x2 ball/sphere
kubli x1 is a cube/polyhedron of material x2 cube

The bo Particle

bo binds tighter than default. It makes the words on either side of it group first.

a b bo c = a (b c)

Now the RIGHT two words combine first, and the left word modifies that compound.

Comparing Groupings

Without bo:

barda blanu gerku = (barda blanu) gerku

(big-blue) dog — a dog that is big-and-blue.

With bo:

barda blanu bo gerku = barda (blanu gerku)

big (blue-dog) — a big instance of a blue-dog.

The Difference in Meaning

(barda blanu) gerku — The dog has the combined property of being big-blue.

barda (blanu gerku) — There's a type called "blue-dog" and this one is big.

The emphasis shifts. With bo, "blue dog" is treated as a single concept.

More Examples

sutra bajra bo gerku = sutra (bajra gerku)

fast (running-dog) — a fast instance of a running-dog.

cmalu xunre bo bolci = cmalu (xunre bolci)

small (red-ball) — a small instance of a red-ball.

Key Point

bo creates tighter binding on the right. Use it to form a (b c) instead of (a b) c.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Apply bo

Rewrite with different grouping using bo:

  1. (barda blanu) zdani → big (blue house)
  2. (sutra klama) prenu → fast (going person)
  3. (cmalu crino) mlatu → small (green cat)
Answers
  1. barda blanu bo zdani
  2. sutra klama bo prenu
  3. cmalu crino bo mlatu

Exercise 2: Identify the Grouping

What does each mean?

  1. barda xunre bo bolci
  2. clani blabi bo karce
  3. sutra bajra bo gerku
Answers
  1. big (red-ball) — a big instance of a red ball
  2. long (white-car) — a long instance of a white car
  3. fast (running-dog) — a fast running-dog

Exercise 3: Use New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. This is a ball.
  2. The cube is blue.
  3. I see a big red ball.
Answers
  1. ti bolci
  2. la kubli cu blanu
  3. mi viska la barda xunre bolci

items.answer: big (red-ball) — a big instance of a red ball
long (white-car) — a long instance of a white car

items.text: I see a big red ball.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "This is a big blue-dog." → ti barda blanu bo gerku
  2. "I have a small red-ball." → mi ponse la cmalu xunre bo bolci
  3. "The cube is white." → la kubli cu blabi

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
bolci x1 is a ball/sphere of x2 ball
kubli x1 is a cube of x2 cube

Grammar:

Cmavo Function
bo Tight binding — makes right side group first

items.place: x1 is a ball/sphere of x2
x1 is a cube of x2

sections.content:
Summary

You learned that bo creates tighter binding, changing a b c from (a b) c to a (b c). This shifts which words form the core concept.
